title: Programming Practical Competency Enhancement: Reinforcement Q-Learning-Based H∞ Control Problem-Solving Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: One can calculate the optimal disturbance attenuation level in H∞ controllers for DLMJSs using reinforcement Q-learning algorithms.
When designing data-driven control policies, one can analyze system stability by applying the Linear Matrix Inequality (LMI) approach.
One can implement and evaluate the performance of a Q-learning-based controller targeting real industrial system models (e.g., DC motors).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
